data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Daman, Daman and Diu, India to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Daman, Daman and Diu, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the county of Daman.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.section_summary: On average, 40 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Daman, Daman and Diu, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, make the 2,103 believers in Daman to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 189,097 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Daman, Daman and Diu, India, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Damān
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Damān, Daman and Diu, India.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the county of Daman, Daman and Diu, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, bless the county of Daman with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Daman, Daman and Diu, India know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.
